paragraph_1.content:
Dear Yasin,

We are pleased to offer you the position of AIML Intern at AIML.

paragraph_2.content: Your start date will be October 25, 2025, and the internship will be for a term of 3 months. You will report to the AIML Internship Coordinator.

paragraph_3.content: As an AIML Intern, you will receive a stipend of [Stipend Amount] per month. Details regarding the specific amount will be provided separately. This internship is subject to the policies and guidelines outlined in the AIML Internship Handbook.

paragraph_4.content: During your internship, you will have access to confidential information belonging to AIML. You are required to maintain the confidentiality of this information, both during and after your internship. A separate Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA) will be provided to you for review and signature prior to your start date.

paragraph_5.content: AIML reserves the right to terminate the internship at any time, with or without cause. Similarly, you may terminate the internship by providing [Number] days' written notice to AIML.

paragraph_6.content: This offer letter and the internship relationship shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India.

paragraph_7.content: Please sign and return this letter by [Response_Date] to indicate your acceptance of this offer. Your signature confirms that you have read, understood, and agree to the terms and conditions outlined in this letter.

signatures.content:
Sincerely,

[HR_Manager]
Human Resources
AIML


Acceptance:

I, Yasin, accept the terms and conditions of this internship offer.

_____________________________
Signature

_____________________________
Date
